oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Explanation of various personal names was given, in the Katkop dialect, by Dia!kwain (L V.-10. 4751-4754, 4758-4777, 18. 5373 rev., 19. 5505 rev. and 5506 rev., 20. 5572 and 5573, 5605-5607). Dia!kwain's explanation of the name his mother gave him after her family was roughly beaten by people who she thought showed no pity. 1) This story is found in Book V-19.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dia!kwain's explanation of the name which his mother gave him
